Title: Pharmacokinetics, bioavailability, and safety of montelukast sodium (MK-0476) in healthy males and females.
Name: Montelukast

Sentece: Following i.v. administration of 9 mg of montelukast sodium to females (N = 6), the values of CL, Vss, t1/2, and MRT i.v. averaged 47.6 ml/min, 9.6 1, 4.5 hr, and 3.6 hr, respectively.
Title: Pharmacokinetics, bioavailability, and safety of montelukast sodium (MK-0476) in healthy males and females.
Name: Montelukast

Sentece: Following oral administration of a 10-mg tablet to females, the mean AUC, Cmax, Tmax, apparent t1/2, MAT and F were 2270 ng.hr/ml, 350 ng/ml, 3.3 hr, 4.4 hr, 2.6 hr, and 58%, respectively.
